faq_items.question: How long does an AI integration project take?
faq_items.answer: The duration varies depending on the project's complexity, from a few weeks for a pilot to several months for a large-scale integration. We define a precise timeline after the audit phase.

faq_items.question: How do you ensure data privacy?
faq_items.answer: Security and confidentiality are our priorities. We comply with current regulations (like GDPR) and implement strict protocols to protect your data at every stage.

software_development.banner_subtitle: From concept to launch, we develop robust, AI-powered software solutions that drive growth and innovation.
software_development.title: Custom Software Development
software_development.description: We create robust and scalable web, mobile, and SaaS platforms, integrating AI to provide smart features and a unique user experience.

faq_items.question: Do you work with agile methodologies?
faq_items.answer: Yes, we favor agile approaches like Scrum to ensure flexibility, transparency, and close collaboration with our clients throughout the project.

faq_items.question: Do you provide maintenance after launch?
faq_items.answer: Absolutely. We offer maintenance and support contracts to ensure the proper functioning, security, and evolution of your software after its production release.
